availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmhand. Kentucky native. Married to Mary M. Ireland Hood in LaRue County, Kentucky, on November 22, 1859. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District, p. 112B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 560-1.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 1, p. 413B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, LaRue County Marriages, Film 000409559.
